summary: On October 21, 1967, over 100,000 protestors gathered in Washington, D.C., for the Mobilization to End the War in Vietnam. It was the largest protest gathering yet, and it brought together ... See full summary »
cast: William Sloane Coffin|N. Paul Stookey|Mary Travers|John Wilson|Peter Yarrow
title: La sixième face du pentagone
